response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly an investment that will add significant value to your operations or personal endeavors. Given its worth to you, we're confident you'll find it invaluable. I propose to sell it to you for $13,000. This price reflects not only its market value but also acknowledges the importance you place on this product. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 13000}
